member.name: T:Wipcore.Enova.Api.Abstractions.Attributes.GroupPresentationAttribute
member.summary: This attribute is used to give information of how a properties should be grouped.

member.name: P:Wipcore.Enova.Api.Abstractions.Attributes.GroupPresentationAttribute.GroupName
member.summary: The name of this group of properties.

member.name: P:Wipcore.Enova.Api.Abstractions.Attributes.GroupPresentationAttribute.PropertyNames
member.summary: The names of the properties belonging to this group.

member.name: P:Wipcore.Enova.Api.Abstractions.Attributes.GroupPresentationAttribute.Visible
member.summary: Whether this group should be visible or not.

member.name: P:Wipcore.Enova.Api.Abstractions.Attributes.GroupPresentationAttribute.SortOrder
member.summary: The order in which this group should appear.

member.name: P:Wipcore.Enova.Api.Abstractions.Attributes.GroupPresentationAttribute.Priority
member.summary: The priority for choosing this group if there are several by the same name. Higher means liklier.

member.name: T:Wipcore.Enova.Api.Abstractions.Attributes.IndexModelAttribute
member.summary: This attribute specifies that a model should be auto-indexed by elastic search

member.name: T:Wipcore.Enova.Api.Abstractions.Attributes.IgnorePropertyOnIndex
member.summary: Specifies that the property should not be indexed in elastic search.

member.name: T:Wipcore.Enova.Api.Abstractions.Attributes.PropertyPresentation
member.summary: This attribute is used to give information of how a property should be presented in the admin.

member.name: P:Wipcore.Enova.Api.Abstractions.Attributes.PropertyPresentation.ControlType
member.summary: The type of html control that should be used for this property. I.e. texbox, label, etc.

member.name: P:Wipcore.Enova.Api.Abstractions.Attributes.PropertyPresentation.ControlLabel
member.summary: The label used to describe this property.

member.name: P:Wipcore.Enova.Api.Abstractions.Attributes.PropertyPresentation.Description
member.summary: The description for this property, if additional information beside the label is needed.

member.name: P:Wipcore.Enova.Api.Abstractions.Attributes.PropertyPresentation.IsEditable
member.summary: Whether this property can be edited by the user.

member.name: P:Wipcore.Enova.Api.Abstractions.Attributes.PropertyPresentation.IsFilterable
member.summary: Whether this property can be used in a filter.

member.name: P:Wipcore.Enova.Api.Abstractions.Attributes.PropertyPresentation.IsGridColumn
member.summary: Whether this property can be shown in the grid view.

member.name: P:Wipcore.Enova.Api.Abstractions.Attributes.PropertyPresentation.SortOrder
member.summary: The sort order for this property to show up as a filter option.

member.name: P:Wipcore.Enova.Api.Abstractions.Attributes.PropertyPresentation.LanguageDependant
member.summary: Whether this property changes depending on the language.

member.name: T:Wipcore.Enova.Api.Abstractions.EnovaApiController
member.summary: Base controller for the Enova Api. Derive from to create new controllers with similar behaviour as standard controllers.
